Package Business

Class WebScrapper

java.lang.Object
Business.WebScrapper
public class WebScrapper
extends java.lang.Object
The type Web scrapper will be extremely useful to help our User Download automatically by groups of 10, all songs from the Official Website that our game uses. This way he will be able to fill up the Databases with songs that might be used along the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WebScrapper​(DatabaseManager databaseManager, Config config)
    Instantiates a new WebScrapper.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static org.jsoup.nodes.Document getHtmlDocument​(java.lang.String url)
    Gets html document.
    static int getStatusConnectionCode​(java.lang.String url)
    This method Gets the status connection code used on the method startWebScrapping().
    void increaseStartAt()
    This method will increase the StartAt variable in charge of indicating the WebScrapper from what page from the website he is supposed to read the songs to be added.
    void registerController​(java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
    The RegisterController method will register the given ActionListener as well as trigger the Timer from our WebScrapper according to the value chosen by our User trough the Config.json file.
    void startWebScrapping()
    This method will Start the WebScrapping by getting a Connection Status Code from the url used to obtain all songs needed in the game.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • WebScrapper

      public WebScrapper​(DatabaseManager databaseManager, Config config)
      Instantiates a new WebScrapper.
      Parameters:
      databaseManager - the Database Manager that will link the downloaded songs to those on the Database.
      config - the config Class will be the link to our config.json file containing the reloading time that our WebScrapper should follow when downloading the songs from the Internet.

  • Method Details

    • startWebScrapping

      public void startWebScrapping()
      This method will Start the WebScrapping by getting a Connection Status Code from the url used to obtain all songs needed in the game. Once this connection is done correctly it will parse the Website and extract the songs in groups of 10 to later on add them to the Databases.

    • getStatusConnectionCode

      public static int getStatusConnectionCode​(java.lang.String url)
      This method Gets the status connection code used on the method startWebScrapping(). If this status is not equal to 200, the connection will not be possible.
      Parameters:
      url - the url from the Website containing all songs for the game.
      Returns:
      the status connection code meant to be used by the WebScrapper as a validation code.

    • getHtmlDocument

      public static org.jsoup.nodes.Document getHtmlDocument​(java.lang.String url)
      Gets html document.
      Parameters:
      url - the url
      Returns:
      the html document

    • increaseStartAt

      public void increaseStartAt()
      This method will increase the StartAt variable in charge of indicating the WebScrapper from what page from the website he is supposed to read the songs to be added. There is a safety lock at 780 as this is the page's limit.

    • registerController

      public void registerController​(java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
      The RegisterController method will register the given ActionListener as well as trigger the Timer from our WebScrapper according to the value chosen by our User trough the Config.json file.
      Parameters:
      actionListener - the Action Listener from the webScrapperUpdateController.
